member.name: M:Unigine.PackageUng.PackageUng(char,int)
member.summary: Constructor. Creates a package using specified compression type, protected by a given password, if provided. By default a package is created using ZLIB compression and without password protection.
member.param: Compression type. One of the COMPRESSION_* variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.PackageUng.createPackage(char)
member.summary: Creates a package with a given name.
member.returns: 1 if a package was created successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.PackageUng.getCompressionType
member.summary: Returns the type of compression used in the package.
member.returns: Compression type. One of the COMPRESSION_* variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.PackageUng.getFileName(int)
member.summary: Returns the name of a file with a given ID.
member.param: File ID. A number between 0 and the total number of files in the package.

member.name: M:Unigine.PackageUng.getNumFiles
member.summary: Returns the number of files in the package.

member.name: M:Unigine.PackageUng.isSupported
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if UNG-packages are supported.
member.returns: 1 if UNG packages are supported; otherwise, 0.UNG-packages are not supported in evaluation version.

member.name: M:Unigine.PackageUng.load(char)
member.summary: Loads a package with a given name.
member.returns: 1 if a package was loaded successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.PackageUng.readFile(unsignedchar,int)
member.summary: Reads the contents of the currently selected file and puts it into the data array. This operation is performed for a currently selected file. To select a file use selectFile().
member.returns: 1 if a file was read successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.PackageUng.selectFile(char,int)
member.summary: Selects a file with a given name as a current one and puts its size to size.
member.param: Integer variable to store the size of the selected file.
member.returns: 1 if a file was selected successfully; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.PackageUng.writeFile(char,unsignedchar,int)
member.summary: Writes data to a file with a given name.
member.param: Size of the data to be written, in bytes.
member.returns: 1 if the data was successfully written to a file; otherwise, 0.

member.name: F:Unigine.PackageUng.COMPRESSION_BEST_SPEED
member.summary: LZ4 compression is used (for faster performance).
